text: Preparing the game Open Excel 2007.  Click any cell, then type bingo. You may merge any two cells and type that word. On the second row, use five columns, and type B I N G O, and make sure those letters are italicized.  Write the numbers as usual in a bingo (75 ball).  Make 2 cards. in a new sheet. It is best if there are 11 columns available (A to K), so that 1 space will be for separation between the two. Playing the game Call some friends (2 is best).  Assign one player to call the numbers, and assign who will use the cards. If there is a remainder, don't use that last card. The caller says the number (or types "=RANDBETWEEN(1,75)" anywhere, and says the number generated), then he erases the number called in the numbers list. To generate a new number, just do this : "CTRL+C+ENTER". Take turns in marking the numbers. If you have it, color the cell black. When someone gets a Bingo, the game is over, and a new game begins.
sentences: Click any cell, then type bingo.
You may merge any two cells and type that word.
On the second row, use five columns, and type B I N G O, and make sure those letters are italicized.
Write the numbers as usual in a bingo (75 ball).
It is best if there are 11 columns available (A to K), so that 1 space will be for separation between the two.
Playing the game Call some friends (2 is best).
Assign one player to call the numbers, and assign who will use the cards.
If there is a remainder, don't use that last card.
The caller says the number (or types "=RANDBETWEEN(1,75)" anywhere, and says the number generated), then he erases the number called in the numbers list.
To generate a new number, just do this : "CTRL+C+ENTER".
Take turns in marking the numbers.
If you have it, color the cell black.
When someone gets a Bingo, the game is over, and a new game begins.
